body:
Add version info for kallisto@0.46.2.

Versions of kallisto since 0.44.0 vendor a copy of htslib and kallisto's cmake bits generate a configure script for it using the auto* tools.  The std cmake args include `-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON`, which causes bits of the cmake verbose output to be embedded in the configure script.  This, in turn, wreaks havoc.

See  https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/15274 and https://github.com/pachterlab/kallisto/issues/253 for additional details.

Closes #15274
title: Update kallisto (with hackery on std_cmake_args)
